data.name: TAISHO x ALICE Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
This digital artbook contains not only the characters, background graphics, event CG, and shadowgraphs from "TAISHO x ALICE", but also the sales promotion illustrations and merchandise illustrations that were released in the past!
In addition to the massive 174-page volume, 22 PC wallpapers are included as a special bonus.

[Contents]
P002 - P028 : Character Illustration
P029 - P034 : Package illustration
P035 - P042 : Illustrations in magazines
P043 - P049 : Character song jacket illustration
P050 - P114 : Event CG
P115 - P121 : Shadowgraphs
P122 - P124 : Background graphics
P125 - P126 : Mini character illustrations
P127 - P173 : Goods illustrations, etc.

*The event CG of "TAISHO x ALICE epilogue" is also included.
If you haven't played the game yet, please finish the game first.
*The illustration for the store bonus is not included.
*New illustrations from "TAISHO x ALICE HEADS & TAILS" are not included.

*The "Digital Artbook (TAISHOxALICE Digital Artbook.pdf)" and "Wallpaper" can be found in the folder where "TAISHO x ALICE epilogue" was installed.
You can browse the installed folder by selecting "Browse local files" in the properties of "TAISHO x ALICE epilogue".

data.short_description: This 174-page digital artbook contains not only the characters, background graphics, event CG and shadowgraphs from "TAISHO x ALICE", but also previously released promotional illustrations and merchandise illustrations. The book also comes with 22 wallpapers for PC as a bonus.
